1.content: Stories abound about the Grand Witch Hazel and her feats of fetish magic. Some scholars have, for the sake of cataloguing, organized these stories based on where they take place.
1.title: Where Do We Find Hazel?

choices: Hazel, peacefully living in a humble abode.
Hazel, trickster and challenger of adventurers.
Hazel, ruler and warrior of the forest, ready for battle.
11.content:
Hazel's Woods:

This category includes stories that follow the traditional concept of Hazel being a witch who lives a secluded life in the forest.

Some travelers stumble across her humble abode by accident, while others seek her out.

Some stories claim that Hazel is quite hospitable, others describe her as more sinister or vindictive.

Sometimes she is described in terms of a trickster, casting spells and blocking paths so that adventurers must defeat her challenges in order to continue on their journeys.

Other times she is regaled as the ruler or warrior of the forest, defending it from all trespassers.

And every day more stories are written. Maybe you'll write some of them.

Regardless of the Grand Witch's role in the forest, however, all stories agree on one thing: She loves to have a good time.
11.title: Hazel's Woods

choices: Hazel has guests over and one of them is the main course.
Hazel is the proud owner of a Humanitarian establishment.
12.content:
A popular topic for stories involving the Grand Witch Hazel is her propensity to eat human beings. Sometimes whole, sometimes in pieces. Sometimes raw, sometimes cooked. Sometimes in their natural form, sometimes transformed into a common dish. Sometimes they want her to eat them, sometimes she eats them regardless. Sometimes she feeds humans to each other; there are rumors she even runs a restaurant where humans are the only thing on the menu.

The stories and rumors may change, but three details stay the same across all of them: Hazel's meals enjoy being meals, her regeneration magic ensures her meals do not die, and Hazel's hunger is never fully satiated.
12.title: Hazel's Kitchen

12121.content:
Hazel hums to herself as she sets her table with a place of one. Her cookbook lies open on the counter, and the oven is preheating. She glances at the time, and sees with excitement and a growl in her stomach that it is almost 4:00. Her guests should be here any moment.

Hazel grins as she looks over the ad she had placed in the local newspaper and on various websites. "Lonely woman seeking company. Please come over for dinner!" She had cast a spell to make sure it could only be seen by people with an interest in being eaten, though this didn't guarantee if they'd actually go through with it. To her delight, she had received several answers, and now had nearly two weeks' worth of dinners scheduled.

The first dinner was about to happen now, as the doorbell rings, and Hazel rushes to the door before her guests can change their mind.

Who are Hazel's guests?

13.content: Recently new stories have emerged positing that the Grand Witch Hazel travels around the country, performing her magic to the delight of audiences all over. It is unclear how many members of the audience are aware that they are not witnessing an illusion, but instead actual magic, but the uncertainty may be what draws audiences to Hazel's shows. Rumors abound of participants being naked, though reports are mixed on this, but all generally agree the performances end in orgasms. Of course, that is par for the course with stories about the Grand Witch of Fetish Magic.
13.title: Hazel's Magic Show

choices: Hazel subjects bound prisoners to her fetish magic.
Hazel performs bondage magic on her clients.
Hazel assists a couple in reigniting their sexual passions.
14.content: There are many who dislike the Grand Witch Hazel and have painted her as a villain, speaking out against her unnatural misconduct and writing tracts thus purport to prove her vile nature. A younger generation has seized upon this older materials and reworked them with a more sexually positive tone, creating a dissonant shift in this particular collection. Much of the work in this category involves bondage, with Hazel shifting from the role of vile dominatrix in older stories to the modern role of sexy dominatrix and even couples' counselor.
14.title: Hazel's Dungeon

1411.content:
Hazel walked down the hall to the interrogation room, looking over the notes Lord Kincaid had provided her. The prisoner was a member of the rebellion forces that had been fighting against Kincaid's rule for the last few years, and he was getting quite sick and tired of them. There were plenty of losses on both sides, though it seemed the more rebels were killed the more they gained sympathizers to their cause, creating a strategic pickle for Kincaid. He desperately wanted to find their base and blow it up, destroy their resources and morale and execute their leaders. This had proven difficult, especially since any rebels that were captured in battle made sure to commit suicide before they could be forced to talk.

This one had been different though. She hadn't been quick enough with the poison- maybe she had hesitated for a fateful second- and so her sacrifice had been halted. Kincaid was not willing to let this chance slip through his fingers, and the woman, identified as Sarah, was now locked in a cell. The notes indicated there had been some torture, but the woman had proven to be resilient; this didn't surprise Hazel- if Sarah was willing to take her own life for the cause, surely she was willing to endure pain even to the point of death for it.

Hence why Hazel was called in, to approach the prisoner from a different angle.

She nodded to the guard standing by the door. He checked her access card, then unsealed the door. "Keep this door sealed until my signal," Hazel instructed.

"Yes, ma'am," the guard replied.

Hazel entered the room. There was a table in the middle, and small cupboard doors in the walls that were locked. Sarah stood at the other end of the room, away from the door, naked. The notes had mentioned that she had been stripped after a suicide attempt using cloth ripped from her shirt. Sarah stared defiantly at Hazel as the door was closed and sealed behind her. Hazel simply gazed up and down her body, and smiled, appreciating the view, which made Sarah self-conscious and she folded her arms across her chest.

"No, no, no, none of that," Hazel said gently. "Let me see your sexiness."

Sarah's face turned bewildered but she didn't move, though Hazel noted a blush creeping across her face. She continued smiling as she placed her notes on the table. "Sarah, my name is Hazel," she said. "Lord Kincaid has enlisted my services to help him get some information out of you. It seems you've been obstinate."

"Kincaid can fuck himself," Sarah responded bitterly. "And you as well!"

Hazel giggled. "Now, now, I don't have a bone in this fight. I'm simply here to do a job. He's not my type, anyway. You, though..." she let her eyes travel down Sarah's body again, causing Sarah to blush and crouch down to cover herself up more.
1411.title: Hazel, Feared Interrogator of the Empire

15.title: Hazel's World
